Information.Subtext: Pulls the categories data from CMC.
This is the key used internally by DataMiner to identify the table entries.
Percent change of this quote in the last 1 hour.
Percent change of this quote in the last 24 hours.
Percent change of this quote in the last 7 days.
Last updated time for this quote.
The symbol of the currency that this quote is expressed in.
This is the display key for this table.
This is the key used internally by DataMiner to identify the table entries.
Number of tokens for this category.
Average price change of coins within this category.
Market cap of coins within this category
Market cap change of coins within this category.
Volume of coins within this category.
Volume change of coins within this category.
Last updated time for this category.

Param.Name: HTTPGlobalMetricsLatestStatusCode
Param.Description: HTTP Global Metrics Latest Status Code

Information.Subtext: Count of active cryptocurrencies tracked by CoinMarketCap. This includes all cryptocurrencies with a listing_status of "active" or "listed" as returned from CMC's /cryptocurrency/map call.
Count of all cryptocurrencies tracked by CoinMarketCap. This includes "inactive" listing_status cryptocurrencies.
Count of active market pairs tracked by CoinMarketCap across all exchanges.
Count of active exchanges tracked by CoinMarketCap. This includes all exchanges with a listing_status of "active" or "listed" as returned by CMC/s /exchange/map call.
Count of all exchanges tracked by CoinMarketCap. This includes "inactive" listing_status exchanges.
Ethereum's market dominance percentage by market cap.
Bitcoin's market dominance percentage by market cap.
Ethereum's market dominance percentage by market cap yesterday.
Bitcoin's market dominance percentage by market cap yesterday.

This is the key used internally by DataMiner to identify the table entries.
Rank of this cryptocurrency on CMC.
Price of the cryptocurrency in USD.
Change in price in USD in the last 1H.
Change in price in USD in the last 24H.
Change in price in USD in the last 7D.

The total market value of a cryptocurrency's circulating supply. It is analogous to the free-float capitalization in the stock market.
Market Cap = Current Price x Circulating Supply.
A measure of how much of a cryptocurrency was traded in the last 24 hours in USD.
The amount of coins that are circulating in the market and are in public hands. It is analogous to the flowing shares in the stock market.
